title: The Prioritizer
description: An all an one app to organize your life. Used five external apis, linked to a SQL Server database, and hosted on Azure.

title: IT Help Desk
description: Collaborated to create a full stack IT Ticket Help Desk allowing users to add, view, bookmark, and comment on tickets.

title: Portfolio Website

title: Tech Connect
